SEARCH
Package photos24

Class SearchController

java.lang.Object
photos24.SearchController
public class SearchController extends Object
Controller for searching photos in the Photos24 application.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private javafx.scene.control.DatePicker
    endDatePicker
    The DatePicker used to choose the end date for filtering photos.
    private List<Picture>
    filteredPhotos
    A List of Picture objects that holds all pictures filtered through the search criteria.
    private javafx.scene.layout.TilePane
    searchResultGrid
    The TilePane that shows all pictures filtered through the search criteria.
    private javafx.scene.control.DatePicker
    startDatePicker
    The DatePicker used to choose the start date for filtering photos.
    private javafx.scene.control.TextField
    tagTextField
    The TextField object used to hold and edit the values of a tag.
    private List<TagValuePair>
    tagValuePairs
    A List of TagValuePair objects that holds all of the User's tags that can be searched by.

    • evaluateTagsWithOperator

      private boolean evaluateTagsWithOperator(Picture picture, List<TagValuePair> pairs)
      Evaluates if a picture satisfies the search criteria based on tags and operators.
      Parameters:
      picture - The picture to evaluate.
      pairs - The list of TagValuePair that represents search criteria.
      Returns:
      True if the picture satisfies the criteria, false otherwise.

    • parseSearchQuery

      private List<TagValuePair> parseSearchQuery(String query)
      Parses the search query into a list of TagValuePairs.
      Parameters:
      query - The search query string.
      Returns:
      A list of TagValuePairs representing the search criteria.

    • isInDateRange

      private boolean isInDateRange(Calendar pictureDate, Calendar startDate, Calendar endDate)
      Checks if a picture's date is within the specified date range.
      Parameters:
      pictureDate - The date of the picture.
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      Returns:
      True if the picture's date is within the range, false otherwise.
